original_title: デスフォレスト 恐怖の森
overview: On their way home from a camping trip, a group of friends become stuck in an eerie forest when their car breaks down. There, they meet a mysterious stranger who warns of monsters lurking in the forest - will they make it out alive?  Based on the popular computer game of the same name.
tagline: Adapted from the smash-hit free game
title: Death Forest: Forbidden Forest
